attributes.action: Take steps to ensure (THAT'S THE ACTIVITY BIT) that we do nothing when Russia invades Cyprus to protect its nationals' interests.
attributes.additional_details: Unlike this country which no longer has the military capability, Russia is likely to take affirmative action to protect the interests of its citizens who have financial interests in Cyprus, which are likely to be robbed by the EU Commission, by invading to prevent the money being stolen.  It is important that this country respects any Russian decision to act, and take it as an excellent example as to how a government should act properly to protect the people who elected them into power.  DO NOT INTERVENE.  IT IS NOTHING TO DO WITH THIS COUNTRY.
